section.title: Live Sites using POI
section.p: Currently we don't have any sites listed that use POI, but we're sure they're out there. Help us change this. If you've written a site that utilises POI let us know.

section.p: POI depends on publically available documents describing various file formats. The list below contains links to some of them.
